name: shooter
description: Shooter is a genre of computer games. At the time of the genre's inception, the word "shooter" became firmly established abroad, as a variant of describing the gameplay and a translation for the word shooter; in Russia and some other countries of the post-Soviet space, the genre was originally called "shooter".

name: action
description: Action is a genre of computer games that emphasizes the exploitation of the player's physical capabilities, including eye-hand coordination and reaction speed.
